DOC.criteria: type II diabetes patient , female non childbearing potential Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) diagnosis confirm Cpeptide > 0.3nmol/L Glutamic acid decarboxylase ( GAD ) antibodies enrolment ( screen ) Treatment metformin single therapy T2DM least 30 day prior enrolment metformin dose must unchanged period History ischemic heart disease , symptomatic heart failure , stroke , transitory ischemic attack symptomatic peripheral vascular disease Any clinically significant abnormality identify physical examination , laboratory test ECG , judgement investigator would compromise subject 's safety successful participation clinical study
